name: Peg Solitaire by BubbaJoe
description:
A collection of four variations of peg solitaire.

Games Included
---------------------------
Sixteen Men, also known as Fore & Aft, English 16, or Swap Squares

English Solitaire

French Solitaire, also known as European Solitaire

German Solitaire, also known as Wiegleb's Solitaire.
